food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys like me a lot! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys enjoy eating me!
💛 I'm a popular fruit that's easy to peel.
🍌 My color is the same as the sun!

food.question: I am small and round, and I grow in a garden. I am red and juicy. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 Gardeners like to grow me.
🔴 I am a popular ingredient to sandwiches.
🥗 I taste great in salads.

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 Bunnies think I'm yummy!
🥕 You can eat me raw or cooked.
🔶 My color is similar to an orange!

food.question: I am white and cold and you eat me with a spoon. I can be chocolate or vanilla flavored. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I'm a perfect treat on a hot day.
🥄 You usually need a spoon to eat me.
🥶 You keep me in the freezer.

food.question: I am made of milk and I can be hard or soft. You can put me on a sandwich or eat me by itself. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Mice are sometimes shown to love me in cartoons.
🥛 I'm a dairy product!
🥪 I can be sliced and put on your favorite sandwich.

food.question: I am round and you slice me into pieces. I can have pepperoni or mushrooms on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I am a popular food that originated in Italy!
🍕 I am often served in triangles!
🍄 I can have lots of different toppings!

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin. I am green inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I look like the bird that cannot fly.
🥝 I have tiny black seeds inside.
🇨🇳 I originated in China!

food.question: I grow on a tree and have a hard shell. People like to crack me open to eat what's inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels love to bury me!
🌳 I grow on trees.
🔨 You might need a tool to open my shell.

food.question: I am made from potatoes and fried in oil. I am often served with burgers. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can ask for ketchup on me!
🥔 I start out as a vegetable.
🇺🇸 I am very popular in the USA!

food.question: I'm a drink made from squeezing a fruit. I am often orange and people have me for breakfast. What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 I taste very similar to an orange.
☀️ I'm a common morning beverage.
🧃 You can buy me in a carton.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I'm sometimes red, or black and small. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very tiny
🧺 I can carry things much heavier than myself
☀️ I like to be outside when it's warm

additionalData.fact: Ants are very strong for their size!

bug.question: I have colorful wings and fly around flowers. I like to drink nectar. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I start as a caterpillar
🌸 I help make flowers grow
🌈 My wings are very pretty colors

bug.question: I make honey in a hive. I can sting you if I feel threatened. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I love flowers and making something sweet
🐝 I buzz around
⚠️ I live in a group with lots of my friends

additionalData.fact: Bees dance to tell other bees where to find flowers!

bug.question: I hop around and eat plants in a garden. I'm often green and have long legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I can jump very high
🎻 Some of my relatives make music
🟢 I like to hang out in grassy areas

additionalData.fact: Grasshoppers can jump 20 times their body length!

bug.question: I fly around at night and am attracted to lights. People often think I'm a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I come out when it's dark
💡 I like to be around artificial light sources
🧥 My wings are usually less colorful than a butterfly

additionalData.fact: Moths help pollinate flowers at night!

bug.question: I have a hard shell and crawl on the ground. Some people think I'm lucky if I land on them. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often red with black spots
🐞 I'm considered a sign of good luck
🌱 I eat aphids, which are pests for plants

additionalData.fact: A ladybug's spots fade as it gets older!

bug.question: I have long, skinny legs and build webs to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is sticky and made of silk
🕷️ I have eight legs!
🪰 I like to eat flies

additionalData.fact: Spider silk is one of the strongest materials on Earth!

bug.question: I make a high pitched whine when I fly. I can bite and drink blood. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I fly near water
🦇 Only the females bite
🤕 My bite can itch a lot

additionalData.fact: Mosquitoes have been around for over 100 million years!

bug.question: I live in the ground and make tunnels. I help aerate the soil. What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I have no legs
🌱 I help plants grow by improving the soil
🌧️ I come out when it rains

additionalData.fact: Earthworms can regenerate lost body parts!

bug.question: I chirp loudly at night, especially in the summer. I rub my wings together to make the sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make music with my body
🦗 I like warm weather
🌳 I live outside on trees

additionalData.fact: Cicadas spend most of their lives underground as nymphs!
